message: I think this is a fair starting point, as I'm taking a larger share since I'm the one making the offer.  What do you think?
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to make a more balanced offer. What do you think?
Let's find a middle ground. I'll take a slightly larger share, but we're both getting closer to an even split.  What do you say?
I'm not willing to give up more than 50% of the original amount. Your turn to make a counteroffer!
